Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo shows severe flooding at a Houston airport.
Understate: The claim understates the severity of the flooding by suggesting that it is a fake photo.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that the photo is fake.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo is digitally manipulated without providing sufficient evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim presents an alternative explanation by stating that the photo is actually an illustration of the effects of sea-level rise on LaGuardia Airport in New York.
